content: अगुरु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. त.] {@--1@} Not heavy, light. {@--2@} (In prosody) Short. {@--3@} Having no teacher. {@--4@} One different from a teacher. --रु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also) [न गुरुर्यस्मात्] {@--1@} The fragrant aloe wood and tree; Aquiluria Agallocha. {@--2@} That which yields Bdellium, Amyris Agallocha. {@--3@} The Śiśu tree (शिंशपा).
